Interface ISystemModule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDestructible, IModule, IPrefsChangeListener, IRenderEnvConsumer, IResourceCache, IUpdateable, java.io.Serializable

    public interface ISystemModule
extends IModule
    Interface for interacting with hardware and external applications.

    • Method Detail

      • exit

        void exit(boolean force)
        Note: This method should only be used if #canExit() returns true.
        Parameters:
        force - If true, skip the exit confirmation dialog.
        See Also:
        canExit()

      • canExit

        boolean canExit()
        Returns:
        true if the application can close itself. This is typically impossible when running in a mobile or embedded context.
        See Also:
        exit(boolean)

      • restart

        void restart()
      throws InitException
        Clear all internal state and return to the titlescreen.
        Throws:
        InitException - If a fatal error occurs during initialization.

      • openWebsite

        void openWebsite(java.lang.String url)
        Opens an external browser for the specified URL.

      • getSystemEnv

        ISystemEnv getSystemEnv()
        Returns:
        The system environment data.

      • setDisplayMode

        void setDisplayMode(DisplayMode mode)
        Changes the current display mode.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the given display mode is unsupported.
        See Also:
        ISystemEnv.isDisplayModeSupported(DisplayMode)
